website_summaries.verdict: The rope style makes this piece stand out from the others.
pros: A classic chandelier shape with a rustic touch
Stands out for its rope frame
cons: Unclear instructions make for difficult installation

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks great. No issues in several months so far and brighter than I expected. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are a little confusing for someone who hasn't put up a chandelier before, but that's why they made YouTube for how to videos, but it was easy to install as I have put up chandeliers before, I will say some of the rods had a little rust which was fine easy enough to clean up, but don't let that deter you away from this beautiful chandelier, I will say i wish it did come with light bulbs say the "vintage" bulbs are hard to come but in store and had to order them online
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp. Looks great I gave it a 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lamp. Looks great I gave it a 4 because the poles that hook from the actual rope bottom to the top ring are very difficult to in in place without others falling off. It would be helpful to provide information on how to align so they go on smoothly. Love the lamp
customer_reviews.author: Cindi C.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for beautiful chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Love the chandelier! We installed ourselves and it was fairly simple. We ended up taking the chain off because it hung too low, but it still looks great! We also bought the dimming Edison lights to go with it and it just completes the look.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light! We are thrilled with it. We have had it up for 3 months now and are so happy with it. The only reason I'm not giving it a full 5 stars is because the install was a bit frustrating. One of the pieces for install was off center so we had to improvise. In the end it all worked out and we are pleased with our purchase. I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime P.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this fixture
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this fixture. I have had so many compliments on this and looks so good in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Came without bulbs, that was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of amber colored industrial bulbs with really made the light spectacular. I was mad when it came without bulbs, but love the light.
customer_reviews.author: arlene c.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these lights are just gorgeous lots of light and we have had so many compliments
customer_reviews.author: kathy bray

customer_reviews.title: Light up my world
customer_reviews.text: I love my new light. I managed to install it by myself....quite the feat. It arrived quickly and in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Kuttner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this chandelier!!!!!! Highly recommend. I get so many compliments. I used the Edison bulbs too and it’s perfect lighting
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love my dining room light. It went perfectly with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much love everything about this pendant chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much love everything about this pendant chandelier! Thankful that I had someone knowledgeable about hanging light fixtures to help me because the instructions that came with the light were little to be desired.....could definitely be improved upon! Overall a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amie Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Actually turned out to be very pretty! I recommend if you’re going for a kinda ...
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical this would look cheesy. Actually turned out to be very pretty! I recommend if you’re going for a kinda farmhouse feel.
customer_reviews.author: Karlee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: We could not be an happier with this product! We love it
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this light but it didn't have ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this light but it didn't have everything needed to mount to the ceiling and the screws weren't long enough. We had to head to the store and get additional things in order to get it up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just what I was looking for in my updated Dining room
customer_reviews.author: Beachbum

customer_reviews.title: Broken supporter
customer_reviews.text: One of the stick that hold the chandelier came broken please send me spare
customer_reviews.author: Maggie l

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some of the rope was loose but still looks good
customer_reviews.author: Happy mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Nautical Décor
customer_reviews.text: Nothing tricky about this to install. Perfect for the Nautical Décor.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Brock

customer_reviews.title: Nice in a toy room or game room but the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice in a toy room or game room but the quality is not suitable for a dinning area or living room.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Marie Torres

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely excited for this light, my master ...
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited for this light, my master electrician almost electrocuted himself trying to install this fixture, there was a faulty wire and the hooks broke when trying to put them together at the right length from our ceiling. Im thinking I'll return all light fixtures I purchased from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Heaven863

customer_reviews.title: The directions are horrible, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Love the light but the directions are the worst ever. Really, four steps to install a hard wired light fixture?? So now I have to order a new one.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These lights look amazing in my new kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These lights look amazing in my new kitchen. I love the rope. Everyone compliments me on the kitchen and the lighting!
customer_reviews.author: LAURA HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: i love the way this fixture looks above my farmhouse style ...
customer_reviews.text: my husband and i looked for a long time for the right chandelier for our new lodge. We were so excited when we got this one. the chandelier is very rustic/industrial in style and very substantial. i love the way this fixture looks above my farmhouse style table, this piece fills the room and provides amazing light. it was in perfect condition out of the box. my electrician had an easy time installing as well.my friends can't believe what i paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The light is beautiful. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this light, but it was broken when we received it. Unfortunately, it did not happen in transit. One of the pieces where the bulb screws in was not bolted into the rest of the light. Not sure how they packaged it, without noticing. The light is beautiful. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT BREAKS
customer_reviews.text: Sure it's pretty but it's a pain to set up and worse of all it broke!
customer_reviews.author: ksquared

customer_reviews.title: I can't recommend a product to people if it does not come ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife received this as a gift, I have opened the box to assemble it and there are no instructions for assembly. I am trying to figure out how to hide the wires and where everything goes and without instructions that is tricky. I can't recommend a product to people if it does not come with instructions for assembly. Now hiring an electrician to come and assemble this.
customer_reviews.author: AKALynnie

customer_reviews.title: Love how it looks
customer_reviews.text: Love how it looks! Shipping was slow. Took about 3 weeks to get to my house. As everyone has said, there are no instructions. All you get are the parts. And it is a little tricky to put all together. We were able to figure out how to install it based on looking at other pictures. Altogether it took over 2 hours to put it up. I wish all of the lights were connected and there was just 1 wire to connect, but each light bulb has to be connected to the top so that's what took the longest. After finally getting it all set up, it does look great and I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Gornoski

product_meta.title: LNC Rustic Farmhouse Chandeliers for Dining Rooms, Pendant Lighting for Kitchen Island, Living Room, A0253202
feature_bullets: ❤ Save an Extra 5% When Ordered 2 Or More By Code: Osaxwwig

★ Inspiration from Nature - Inspired by natural element, we add jute rope into this rustic chandelier. The natural jute rope allows you to escape from the bustling city and brings you back to the nature. Think of the wide swaying fields of golden wheat and feel yourself peaceful and calm.

★ Farmhouse yet Fashion - This farmhouse chandelier looks beautiful in all kinds of home. Its rustic look updates to your house completely and adds a bit farmhouse flavor. It gives a sense of nature and freedom in look and fits well within spacious space such as living room, dining room, bedroom, etc.

★ Dimension - This dining room chandelier is 24” x 19” and the canopy is 5. 3” x 1”. The 21. 7” attachment chain is fully adjustable, allowing you to customize the fixture to your lighting needs and desired look.

★ Free Installation - This chandelier for dining rooms was upgraded based on thousands of our customers’ requests. We did our best to help you save your money and time! All you need to do is adjusting the desired chain height and wiring, then screwing in bulbs! Yes, it’s that simple.

★ Buy with Confidence – All wagon wheel chandeliers are UL certified to be anti-rust and shockproof. 6x E26 Max 60W Type A Bulb (Not Included). If you have any questions, please contact us. Our outstanding customer service will bring a smile back to you.
